text: "Chinnasalem railway station" Chinnasalem is a panchayat town in Kallakurichi district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. It is also the headquarters of Chinnasalem Taluk. ==Demographics== As of 2001 India census, Chinnasalem had a population of 19519. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Chinnasalem has an average literacy rate of 75%, higher than the national average of 50.5%; with male literacy of 78% and female literacy of 50%. 11% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Education== The town has engineering colleges, arts and science colleges and teacher training institutions. ===Colleges=== * Idhaya Engineering College for Women * Government Industrial Training Institute, Chinnasalem * Maha Barathi Engineering College == References == == External links == Category:Cities and towns in Kallakurichi district
title: Chinnasalem
